Use this guide to test Alipay payments on your Checkout.com integration. * Payment method: **Alipay** * Supported countries: **China** * Payment provider ID: `lpp_12` * Type: **Wallet** * Clearing and settlement: **Instant** * Processing currencies: **USD** * Settlement currencies: **USD** * Refunds: **Yes** * Partial refunds: **Yes**  
Before testing, ensure that your account has been enabled to support Alipay payments. Contact your relationship manager for more information. 
**Testing a payment** <span class="step_hl">Step 1:</span> Create a $1.00 USD transaction and select *Alipay* from the list of alternative payment options in the Checkout.js Payment Lightbox. You will be redirected to Alipay's website. <span class="step_hl">Step 2:</span> Click the button on the right to log in with your username and password. 
Upload an image...
alipay-step-2.png
change·remove

Don't have one handy? Use our logo to start!

<span class="step_hl">Step 3:</span> Enter the following login details: * Username: **alipaytest20091@gmail.com** * Pasword: **111111** Click the *blue button* at the bottom of the form to continue. 
Upload an image...
alipay-step-3.png
change·remove

Don't have one handy? Use our logo to start!

<span class="step_hl">Step 4:</span> Enter **111111** into the box and click the *blue button* to complete the payment. 
Upload an image...
alipay-step-4.png
change·remove

Don't have one handy? Use our logo to start!

If the payment is successful you will be redirected to your success page.  
Upload an image...
payment-success-page.png
change·remove

Don't have one handy? Use our logo to start!

 
Use this guide to test Boleto payments on your Checkout.com integration. * Payment method: **Boleto** * Supported countries: **Brazil** * Payment provider ID: `lpp_15` * Type: **Voucher** * Clearing and settlement: **Deferred+** * Processing currencies: **USD** & **BRL** * Settlement currencies: **USD** & **EUR** * Refunds: **No** * Partial refunds: **No**  
Before testing, ensure that your account has been enabled to support Boleto payments. Contact your relationship manager for more information. 
<span class="step_hl">Step 1:</span> Create a transaction (e.g., $1.00 USD) and select Boleto from the list of alternative payment options in the Checkout.js payment lightbox. You will be redirected to Boleto's website. 
Upload an image...
boleto-1.png
change·remove

Don't have one handy? Use our logo to start!

<span class="step_hl">Step 2:</span> Enter the following details: * Date of Birth: **28/04/1977** * CPF: **75115214440** * Customer Name: **ASTROPAY TESTING** Click *SUBMIT* to continue. 
Upload an image...
boleto-2.png
change·remove

Don't have one handy? Use our logo to start!

<span class="step_hl">Step 3:</span> Click *DOWNLOAD VOUCHER* to download the payment voucher.  
Upload an image...
boleto-3.png
change·remove

Don't have one handy? Use our logo to start!

**The Boleto voucher**  
Upload an image...
boleto-4.png
change·remove

Don't have one handy? Use our logo to start!

As the voucher downloads, you will be redirected to the success page.  
Upload an image...
payment-success-page.png
change·remove

Don't have one handy? Use our logo to start!

 
Use this guide to test iDEAL payments on your Checkout.com integration. * Payment method: **iDEAL-ING** * Supported countries: **The Netherlands** * Payment provider ID: `lpp_9` * Type: **Online Banking** * Clearing and settlement: **Instant** * Processing currencies: **EUR** * Settlement currencies: **EUR** * Refunds: **Yes** * Partial refunds: **Yes**  
Before testing, ensure that your account has been enabled to support Boleto payments. Contact your relationship manager for more information. 
<span class="step_hl">Step 1:</span> Create a transaction and select *iDEAL* from the list of alternative payment options in the Checkout.js payment lightbox. 
Upload an image...
iDEAL-1.png
change·remove

Don't have one handy? Use our logo to start!

<span class="step_hl">Step 2:</span> Select *Issuer ID: Issuer Simulation V3 - ING* and click *Submit*. You will be redirected to iDEAL’s website.  
Upload an image...
iDEAL-2.png
change·remove

Don't have one handy? Use our logo to start!

<span class="step_hl">Step 3:</span> Click *Confirm Transaction* to redirect to the payment success page. 
Upload an image...
iDEAL-3.png
change·remove

Don't have one handy? Use our logo to start!

 
Use this guide to test POLi payments on your Checkout.com integration. * Payment method: **POLi** * Supported countries: **Australia** & **New Zealand** * Payment provider ID: `lpp_13` * Type: **Online Banking** * Clearing and settlement: **Instant** * Processing currencies: **AUD** & **NZD** * Settlement currencies: **AUD** & **NZD** * Refunds: **No** * Partial refunds: **No**  
Before testing, ensure that your account has been enabled to support POLi payments. Contact your relationship manager for more information. 
<span class="step_hl">Step 1:</span> Create a transaction (e.g., $1.00 AUD) and select *POLi* from the list of alternative payment options in the Checkout.js payment lightbox. You will be redirected to POLi's website.  
Upload an image...
poli-1.png
change·remove

Don't have one handy? Use our logo to start!

<span class="step_hl">Step 2:</span> Select *iBank AU 01* from the dropdown menu and click *Continue*.  
Upload an image...
poli-2.png
change·remove

Don't have one handy? Use our logo to start!

<span class="step_hl">Step 3:</span> Enter the following login details: * Username: **DemoShopper** * Password: **DemoShopper** Click *Login* to continue. 
Upload an image...
change·remove

Don't have one handy? Use our logo to start!

<span class="step_hl">Step 4:</span> Select *Savings (123456) 98742364* from the dropdown meny and click Continue. 
Upload an image...
poli-4.png
change·remove

Don't have one handy? Use our logo to start!

<span class="step_hl">Step 5:</span> Click *Confirm* to complete the payment. 
Upload an image...
poli-5.png
change·remove

Don't have one handy? Use our logo to start!

If the payment is successful, you will be redirected to your success page.

Use this guide to test Sofort payments on your Checkout.com integration. * Payment method: **Sofort** * Supported countries: **Germany** * Payment provider ID: `lpp_14` * Type: **Online Banking** * Clearing and settlement: **Deferred++++** * Processing currencies: **EUR** * Settlement currencies: **EUR** * Refunds: **Yes** * Partial refunds: **Yes**  
Before you begin testing, ensure that your account has been enabled to support Sofort payments. Contact your relationship manager or the integration team for more information. 
<span class="step_hl">Step 1:</span> Create a Sofort transaction. For more information, see [this page](doc:process-alternative-payment-methods). 
Upload an image...
sofort-1.png
change·remove

Don't have one handy? Use our logo to start!

<span class="step_hl">Step 2:</span> You will be redirected to Sofort’s website. Enter *88888888* in the sort code field and click *Next*. 
Upload an image...
sofort-2.png
change·remove

Don't have one handy? Use our logo to start!

<span class="step_hl">Step 3:</span> On the next screen, enter the following: Account Number: **Germany** PIN: **88888888** Click *Next* to continue. 
Upload an image...
sofort-3.png
change·remove

Don't have one handy? Use our logo to start!

<span class="step_hl">Step 4:</span> On the Account selection screen, select *23456789 - Girokonto (Max Mustermann)* and click *Next*. 
Upload an image...
sofort-4.png
change·remove

Don't have one handy? Use our logo to start!

<span class="step_hl">Step 5:</span> Finally, enter *12345* in the TAN field. 
Upload an image...
sofort-5.png
change·remove

Don't have one handy? Use our logo to start!

Once you click *Next*, you will be redirected to your success page and the transaction will enter deferred capture status. 
Upload an image...
payment-success-page.png
change·remove

Don't have one handy? Use our logo to start!

 
Thanks for using Checkout.com. If you need any help or support, then message our support team at [support@checkout.com](mailto:support@checkout.com).
